definition: to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: The International Association of State Lotteries lists 63 members.
sentences.chinese: 國家彩票組織國際協會有63個成員。

sentences.english: Our international association, are working worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 我們的國際協會，正在世界各地。

sentences.english: CTIA, the International Association for the Wireless Telecommunications Industry, dismissed the report.
sentences.chinese: 爲無線通信產業的國際協會，駁斥了這一說法。

sentences.english: He played a leading role in founding the International Association for China Planning (IACP).
sentences.chinese: 他是中國規劃國際協會的重要決策者。
